column2: "Everyone around me is always talking about how excellent your abilities are."
"I feel this might be a bit late, but I am interested in your true abilities."
"Would you mind attempting a time attack? The difficulty is Very Hard."
"Show me your maneuvers while adhering to the time limit, and complete it with a rating you deserve."
"You'll leave your record and get a reward. It's a great chance to test your abilities. You have anything to lose."
